about_the_game:
This is a short story about love for books!

Books have always been important to you. They were your guides, your friends. Your escape from everyday problems. But while you were gone some of them have gone missing. Find the misplaced books. Take care of the ones that have been mistreated. Put them back where they belong.

There are 9 lovely homes. And people that live there need you to come in and help them.
Visit charming homes full of books. Go to different rooms in search of missing books. Fix the covers if needed. Return the books to their correct places.

Features
  • 9 lovingly hand-painted homes for you to visit
  • Explore rooms and find missing books
  • Relaxing puzzles: logic, jigsaw, hidden object
  • Restore books and put them back on shelves
  • Collect bookmarks and other trinkets
  • Follow a sweet story about loving books
  • No times, no scores
  • Mouse only

This game is in early development so some things may change.

name: Books in Wrong Places

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: 2GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with 500Mb memory
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
